title: Pink Siifu Announces New Album Black’!Antique, Shares New Song “WhoUWithHo+”: Listen
description: The new single from Pink Siifu’s Gumbo’!-follow-up features Dallas-born producer and artist Kal Banx
author: Madison Bloom
excerpt: The new single from Pink Siifu’s Gumbo’!-follow-up features Dallas-born producer and artist Kal Banx
text: Pink Siifu has announced a new album: Black’!Antique will arrive January 27 via Dynamite Hill. Today, Siifu has shared a new single from the project, “WhoUWithHo+.” The track features Dallas-born producer and artist Kal Banx. Check it out below.Black’!Antique follows Siifu’s 2021 solo LP Gumbo’!, as well as a pair of collaborative albums from last year: Leather Blvd., with Ahwlee, and It’s Too Quiet..’!!, alongside Turich Benjy.“This album was made with the intent to sharpen and truly show that an artist should be one of one,” Siifu said of Black’!Antique in press materials. He continued:This album is the shit eye say to myself in the mirror. We get each album/project to tell a different side of ourselves, bring you into a world, speak on our existence and express ourselves in depth. Everything present and in front of you isn’t here to stay, but the memory and the stories will forever be something. That’s an Antique’! Something or Someone Who is Here to Stay’! A Source of Inspiration, Power and Something Timeless’!“WhoUWithHo+” follows Siifu’s previous Black’!Antique single “Screw4Life’! RIPJalen’!”
html:
Pink Siifu has announced a new album: Black’!Antique will arrive January 27 via Dynamite Hill. Today, Siifu has shared a new single from the project, “WhoUWithHo+.” The track features Dallas-born producer and artist Kal Banx. Check it out below.

Black’!Antique follows Siifu’s 2021 solo LP Gumbo’!, as well as a pair of collaborative albums from last year: Leather Blvd., with Ahwlee, and It’s Too Quiet..’!!, alongside Turich Benjy.

“This album was made with the intent to sharpen and truly show that an artist should be one of one,” Siifu said of Black’!Antique in press materials. He continued:

This album is the shit eye say to myself in the mirror. We get each album/project to tell a different side of ourselves, bring you into a world, speak on our existence and express ourselves in depth. Everything present and in front of you isn’t here to stay, but the memory and the stories will forever be something. That’s an Antique’! Something or Someone Who is Here to Stay’! A Source of Inspiration, Power and Something Timeless’!

“WhoUWithHo+” follows Siifu’s previous Black’!Antique single “Screw4Life’! RIPJalen’!”
